intro: Peplidium aithocheilum, commonly known as the narrow-leaved peplidium, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid or semi-arid environments. Due to its unique morphology and habitat, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
